2,501 American soldiers gave their lives along the beachheads of Normandy on June 6, 1944. Thousands more were injured.
 
D-Day was a monumental effort to help defeat Nazi Germany and end WWII. 78 years later, we still honor and remember their incredible sacrifice. https://t.co/OX6zXhOnom
